com.jcabi.xml

Interface XSL

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XSLChain, XSLDocument

    @Immutable
public interface XSL
    XSL stylesheet.

    Implementation of this interface must be immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.4
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
    See Also:
    XSLDocument
